attributes.action: Stop Boris Johnson becoming our Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
As a major spokesperson for the leave campaign Mr Johnson failed to point out a clear plan going forward after the exist. He repeatedly gave wrong information and dismissed the experts advice.
We live in a democratic society and respect the result of the referendum , however Mr Johnson is not fit to be our next prime minister,,,,,,
attributes.background:
On Thursday June 23rd Britons voted with a slim majority to leave the European Union.
The vote to leave was based in large part on unrealistic promises including promises with £350 m a week going to NHS .

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
